modName: Sweet and Sexy Lingerie shop CBBE
summary:
This adds more than 40 pieces of sexy lingerie.

Over 18 years old is requiered.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img62/4707/introfn.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/2282/descriptionw.png[/img]

[b]Hi and welcome on my mod. This mod add a lingerie shop located in Sollitude. A totally new kind of the with new textures, new items and a sweet atmosphere...
You can find more than 40 pieces of lingerie with pushup effet. It gives you a more natural effect with the tight clothes. The breasts are not wood, they own a physic. According to the clothing worn they change shape and adapt. This mod corrects that. The effect is more noticeable if you have a character with a big chest.[/b]

[img]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/2514/aword.png[/img]
The Pushup body called also ( CBBEPU ) is a modified body from Caliente made by me. It "equip" the most of my clothing mods to give a more natural effect with the tight clothes. [color=red]That why all my mods are uncompatible with other type of body [/color]. This body works perfectly with all the CBBE original bodies. See my others mods to see more examples. It doesn't replace anything.

[img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/5889/pushupd.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/8249/udpate.png[/img]

[b][color=orange] version 1.3 (currently version)[/color][/b]

Version 1.4

- Missing textures are fixed.
- Delete protected content.

Version 1.3

- "Guépière" are fixed.
- Manakin black head fixed.
- Black and motif body has benn remeshed to avoid cliping on the right breast.

Version 1.2

- Fix the bug of the "empty chest".
- Fix the dark head of the vendor.

Version 1.0

[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img543/728/screenshot444n.jpg[/img]

- Make sure tu use the lastest update or the desired version.
- Make sure you have the lighe ''bEnableFileSelection=1'' in SkyrimPrefs.ini under [Launcher].
- Make sure "SweetandSexy Lingerie.esp" is checked in Data Files in the Skyrim launcher or in Nexus mod Manager.
- If you update, copy files into data directory and click Ok to overwrite files.

If it you first mod you have to add that line in SkyrimPrefs.ini located in My document/MyGames/Skyrim or something. Add the line in bold in [Launcher] section like this :

[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection=1

To uninstall:
1. Start Skyrim launcher, click Data Files, .esp.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/1424/recomm.png[/img]

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666][color=orange]Calientes Female Body –CBBE by Caliente [/color][/url]

[img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/2119/bugsyl.png[/img]

A mannequin in Honeyside is missing.

[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img19/7303/screenshot222x.jpg[/img]

This mod would not have been possible without the work of this modders.

*KURESE for the lingerie meshes and textures.
*Tona and Toshio for underwears meshes and textures.
*Petrovich for the corset and underwears meshes and textures.
*Caliente for Caliente's Body Mod - Big Bottom Edition v3.
*Iamthedoctor for the statues (use only in the Sweet and Sexy Lingerie mod).
*Electionis for the heels.

*If I forgot anyone, it was unintentional. Report it to me so I add you to credits.

No russian translation or permission will be given. My files has been stolen by russians without asking me permission. Sorry for honnest russian players.

A word about picture copyright : All the pictures used in come from me or come from http://images.4ever.eu/ and are free of right according the copyright rules www.http://pictures.4ever.eu/copyright
Images and illustrations used belong to their respective authors.

-Screenshots taken by Dkmt79
-The character of Penelope Jolicoeur is owned and designed by Penelope Bagieu and not subject to any commercial use or detrimental to the original work.

[img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/5576/licencing2.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/7055/videoseg.png[/img]

files.name: Sweet and Sexy Lingerie 2-0
files.changelogHtml:
Add images and sign into the shop.
Fix mannequin
Add Navmesh. NPC can walk into the shop.
Blue stripped underwear is fixed

files.name: Sweet and Sexy Lingerie 3-0
files.changelogHtml:
General

All the lingerie pieces runs with the Pushup Body 4.0

-The name of the shop has been changed, and the name of the vendor.
-Add several ads and sexy image inside the shop.
-Add furniture.

Clothes

-Red guepiere has been removed.
-Blue, pink, red babydolls has beel removed.
-Purpul Moon has been removed.
-A kind of undies has been removed.

-Moon outfit has been releshed and parts has been added.
-3 kind of stocking has been added (black and white, up to 6).
-Bikinis has been retextured.
-Add white heels.
-Corsets has been remeshed and now are compatible with stockings.
-Add retextures for underwears.
